item.title: By: DOm
item.dc:creator: DOm
item.description: <p>that day i spent five hours getting home (usually one and a half). three hours of that were spent driving the ten miles between junctions 12 and 11 of the M1. interesting that in the news today that connex has lost it's contract with the state rail authority. maybe others including anglia will notice.</p>
item.content:encoded: that day i spent five hours getting home (usually one and a half). three hours of that were spent driving the ten miles between junctions 12 and 11 of the M1. interesting that in the news today that connex has lost it’s contract with the state rail authority. maybe others including anglia will notice.

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: <p>That sounds like the worst journey...ever. Shenfield is no distance from London. I hope that Anglia give you and your taxi sharers a bit of compensation!!</p>
item.content:encoded: That sounds like the worst journey…ever. Shenfield is no distance from London. I hope that Anglia give you and your taxi sharers a bit of compensation!!
